column5: Well I’m not gonna tell the fuckin salesman that I’m gonna be carrying weed with the gun that I purchased dumbass plus ion even got a criminal history.

LMAO who is not smoking weed during all of this shit going on.. get lost!
I didn’t ask for a smart ass reply I asked for answers. Bitch !
Extremely jealous but well done. 👍🏻💯

Well see I usually smoke it on the side of the house when they are not home but I don’t have a lot of time to before they get back home from work after I get off but they’ve told me they don’t want it in or around their house but I’m always gonna have it in their house anyways until I can get my own place n btw yes I’m 18 so are you saying I should just smoke it on side of the house even when they are here ? Bc I think they’ll snap on me tbh they’ve threatened to call the cops idk if they actually would tho ..
What site can I get it from ? Do you smoke blunts or pipes w it ?
I only smoke out of my window sometimes but usually I just go outside I really just wanna find places I can go to smoke by myself not a lot of options tho.

So recently I lost my virginity but it was bc my friend set me up w a girl but I had to pay her, not a lot but anyways I just don’t know how to approach getting myself out there to more girls for sex only bc I’m not really looking for a full on relationship right now I just wanna have some more fun but do it the right way and be respectful about it too.. Any tips on how to go about getting girls to just have sex without the dating and such ?
I’m white n ion know nun them “white” shows you talm bout....

Yup I deal with this I get depressed then over time I just get tired of it and start to get angry with everything  and the world and honestly the way I deal with it personally is I just pray and smoke some tree.
Thank you for the advice!! I’m just gonna have to sit down and brain storm something up to make more money than I’m making now and also not feel so bad doing it.. and thank you again!!
Tell him if his friend is tryna hit on you then he’s NOT being true to his friend anyways...

I am responsible I’m more responsible than my 26 year old sister that has 3 kids my parents have even told me this.. but I just probably wasn’t that responsible in this particular instance but what can I say honestly?? I’m only 18 obviously I’m gonna make dumb stupid mistakes.. everybody does.. that doesn’t mean my life is over and plus this girl already has 2 kids and she’s a little older than me so I somewhat trust that what she said about her not being fertile rn is true.. and she’s got money to get herself a pill.. and I can’t MAKE her take it. I already suggested to her that she should tho but her response was that she’s not fertile.. so honestly what more could I do??.. 🤷🏻‍♂️
It does but I can’t do anything about it so I just shut down and go numb.. when I’m able to smoke tree that helps me the most it takes my mind completely away from my problems.

See I can’t even do that no matter how much I try to build it up my eyes just fill with water and I try to cry but can’t do it just makes me feel even worse bc I can’t get any release so it just adds to my depression more.. then I start to feel anger along with depression.
I feel this too just as much as you do I don’t have any solutions for you bc I need them myself but at least we went alone in feeling the same way..

I feel every word of what you just said to the fullest really.. at the least we can do is go on with our life knowing that we are not alone in feeling this exact same way.. maybe that can help.. at least a little.

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHGGGG!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! FUCK!!!!
Yes!! It’s like I’m depressed and feel down all the time but I’m so used to feeling this way that when I do catch myself in a good mood I feel out of place.. like I shouldn’t be in a good mood.
Well she told me she’s not fertile right now..

I mean I wanted to be safe to begin w that’s why I got the condoms in the first place but I didn’t know it was going to fall off and I think I did get size too small maybe that’s why idk but yeah I know you’re right I’ll take your advice to mind definitely but I’ve also gotta say it’s 100x better without a condom so how are you supposed to be safe and not use one?

You’re right I should be more cautious but I’m 18 I been tryna live fast lately bc since I graduated life has been slow and boring and I’ve just been depressed so I’ve been tryn to do things to make me feel better and I know it’s dumb but maybe now I’ll take a step back for now and slow down after that and just chill but I told her to take a pill but she’s gonna have to pay for it w her own money or the $200 I gave her bc I’m not jus gonna keep feeding her money.

I definitely see what you mean I’ll ask her to take one but I ain’t gonna pay her to do that and how tf pregnancy gonna happen if I ain’t cum in her? Explain bc I’ve never heard of that.. don’t even make sense and I don’t really got a car to go get tested and parents can’t take me bc they can’t find out any of this happened or I’m a dead man anyways...

No when I said I wasn’t her first time I just meant in general she don’t even do this regularly w anybody really.. it was my friend that talked her into doing it and I didn’t even tell my friend to do that he was just wanting me to hook me up.. my friend and her both told me she don’t really do this type of thing that’s why she told me she was a little nervous but maybe I should’ve stopped when I realized the condom was missing but I was already in there without it so I just said fuck it and kept goin but I’m all good bruh I mean yeah I don’t know for 100% if she had anything but I seriously I doubt it and I ain’t had no problems since then so it is what it is .. 🤷🏻‍♂️

I just lost my virginity last night too and I feel the same way bc it went way better than I ever expected it would it was amazing but now I just want more but the only thing tho is idk if the girl is down to do it again or if to her it was only a 1 time thing?? I hope she’s down to do it again idk why she wouldn’t bc she was loving it when I was goin hard from the back.. I’m already depressed most of the time but I hope it don’t lead to even worse depression from feeling the need to do it again but end up not bring able to bc this the only girl I’ve come in contact with for a while that has even been willing to do it bc I stay at work and home the most of the time..
